meanings.sent1: The masonries of the skilled worker were admired by all.
meanings.sent2: The ancient castle's masonries stood strong for centuries.
meanings.sent3: The masonries of the playful builder included a secret passage.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her craft was evident in the intricate masonries she created.
meanings.sent5: The masonries of the cathedral were a testament to human ingenuity.

meanings.definition: The structures built by a mason.
meanings.sent1: The masonries of the house were solid and well-crafted.
meanings.sent2: The masonries of the wall showed the mason's expertise.
meanings.sent3: The masonries of the tower seemed to reach the sky.
meanings.sent4: The masonries of the bridge connected the two sides seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The masonries of the temple were a sight to behold.
